```{r data_proc, echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
download.file(url = "https://stacks.stanford.edu/file/druid:tr137st9964/tr137st9964_ct_hartford_2019_02_25.rds",
              destfile = "ct_hartford.rds",
              mode = "wb")
```
